transcript:
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Uh good afternoon. Komal baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. Pradeep ji se baat ho jayegi Harsh Product par?
Executive: Sir to nahi hai.
Customer: Sir nahi hai. Baad me aayenge.
Executive: Haan ma'am abhi aapka na discussion hua tha IndiaMART pe service ke regarding Harsh Product ke liye.
Customer: Haan jhalele. Sir nahi hai. Aata var call kara tumhi return. Jhalela. 
Executive: Kya keh rahe hai ma'am aap?
Customer: Abhi sir nahi hai. Wo aa jayenge to bata denge. Call kar.
Executive: Theek hai. Aap mere ko sir ka number share kar sakte ho? To main directly sir ke number pe call kar leti hu.
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Nahi nahi. Sir aayenge tab hum batayenge unko.
Customer: Theek hai. Main kab tak call back kar lu fir aapko?
Executive: (background conversation) Aadha paun ghante baad.
Customer: Aadha paun ghante baad karo.
Executive: Aadhe paun ghante me. Theek hai ma'am. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wanted to speak with Pradeep ji from Harsh Product.
- Pradeep ji was unavailable.


Resolution:

- Informed that the concerned person was not available.
- Refused to share the contact number.
- Advised to call back in 30-45 minutes.


Next Steps: 
Issue not resolved. Executive will call back in 30-45 minutes.

Alert (If Any):
None

@@@Sentiment:
- Neutral -> Neutral

@@@Key Topics:
- callback, contact person unavailable, service discussion
